```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
#create an expression
 fx <- expression(x^2)

#find the derivative
 df_dx <- D(expr = fx, name = "x")

#run at x=3
 x <- 3
eval(df_dx)
 
```

```{r}
#expression
fa <- expression(2 * (3 * a +2)^4 - 5)

#find the derivative
df_da <- D(expr = fa, name = "a")

#run at a = 1.2
a <- 1.2
eval(df_da)
```
